name: The Assault on Jorrvaskr
trigger_condition: silver_hand_assault_preparation clock reaches 6 OR companions_silver_hand_endgame fails

zones.name: Outer Yard
zones.description: The training yard and approach. First Silver Hand wave hits here.
scene_aspects: Skyforge Silhouette Against the Night Sky

zones.name: Grand Hall
zones.description: The main hall of Jorrvaskr. Second wave breaches through windows and the main door.
scene_aspects: The Companions' Weapons on the Walls — Take Them if You Dare

zones.name: Harbinger's Chamber
zones.description: Kodlak's room. The Silver Hand commander makes for the Harbinger.
scene_aspects: Narrow Doorway — One at a Time
Kodlak's Writing Table — Evidence of the Cure Research
The Smell of Old Leather and Juniper — and Now Blood

enemy_mix: Silver Hand Siege Engineer (support — sets fire aspects, Act 2)

defense_pool.description: Named NPCs each absorb one consequence before being taken out. Taken-out NPCs are dead.

defenders.save_gate: PC Physique vs Great (+4) to pull Kodlak from killing blow
PC Fight vs Great (+4) to shield Skjor at the breach

pool_modifiers.effect: Defense pool reduced by 2 (whelps do not fight coherently)
Skjor not present; pool reduced by 1
Defense pool +1 (whelps fight as a unit)

act_structure.name: Hold the Yard
act_structure.mechanics: Zone conflict. PC and available defenders vs first Silver Hand wave. Physique or Fight to create advantages. Failure: breach doors to Grand Hall.
act_structure.save_gate: PC Will vs Good (+3) to prevent whelp panic — failure loses 1 whelp defender

act_structure.name: Protect the Grand Hall
act_structure.mechanics: Chase + combat hybrid. Silver Hand veterans push into the hall. Fire aspect created by Siege Engineer if not stopped. PC Fight vs Superb (+5) to hold the breach.
act_structure.save_gate: PC Athletics vs Fair (+2) to drag a wounded NPC clear of fire

act_structure.name: The Commander's Gambit
act_structure.mechanics: Boss fight (Silver Hand Commander) in narrow Harbinger's chamber. Commander targets Kodlak directly. PC must split actions between combat and protection.
act_structure.save_gate: PC Physique vs Great (+4) to physically interpose between Commander and Kodlak

gm_notes: The assault should feel genuinely dangerous. The GM should NOT protect Kodlak and Skjor by default — their deaths are meaningful outcomes. The save gates exist to give the PC agency, not to guarantee survival. Run each act as a full scene with its own consequences track before advancing.
